column1: #Text=Aang says : " Zuko , I think the past is trying to kill me . "
#Text=Zuko says : " I ca n't believe it .
#Text=Maybe this means we should n't be here .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Where 's that up - beat attitude you were talkin ' about ?
#Text=Besides , people do n't make traps unless they 've got something worth protecting .
